Articles.title: 'this is not a nft'
Articles.text: 'This is not a nft' is the symbol of my collection. That’s why it’s named like it. I do not stand with values shared with nfts and cryptocurrency. That’s my vision and i completely get it if you do. I think creating a new system built bearly teh same as the old one creates the same problems.
